Articles.Content:
I saw that there was a memorial fund being put together for the family of the copilot of the Virgin Galactic SpaceShipTwo Crash. He has a wife and two daughters.

I figured I'd post it here in case anybody was interested in tossing in.

http://www.gofundme.com/MikeAlsbury

Crap. And only now do I realize I spelled SpaceShipTwo wrong in the headline...can a mod fix that?

*grumbles* only have on contact in so half the time my vision is blurry.

Corrected! Yay!

Edited November 4, 2014 by Mazon Del

I saw that there was a memorial fund being put together for the family of the copilot of the Virgin Galactic SpaceShipTwo Crash. He has a wife and two daughters.

I figured I'd post it here in case anybody was interested in tossing in.

http://www.gofundme.com/MikeAlsbury

Crap. And only now do I realize I spelled SpaceShipTwo wrong in the headline...can a mod fix that?

*grumbles* only have on contact in so half the time my vision is blurry.

You can fix it yourself. Edit the message, then Go Advanced, then edit the topic line.

To change the title of your post, go to the Space Lounge and double-click on the word "Spaceflight" next to your title. The title should change to a text box that can be edited.

Thanks for bringing this to my attention! I would love to donate to this.

[EDIT: Ninja'd as expected. My way of title changing is easier though ]
